summary: ON JANUARY 14 2015, AT 278 MILES, BARELY ONE YEAR AFTER PURCHASE, THE  REAR MASTER CYLINDER FAILED, DECREASING SIGNIFICANTLY THE BRAKING CAPACITY OF THE MOTORCYCLE. LUCKILY NO ACCIDENT OR INCIDENT OCCURRED.  MANUFACTURER/DISTRIBUTOR, PIT MOTORS, 6950 CENTRAL HIGHWAY, PENNSAUKEN, NJ, 08109, DECLINED RESPONSIBILITY.   I CONSIDER THIS TO BE A SIGNIFICANT SAFETY DEFECT, THEY COULD NOT EVEN PROVIDE AN EXACT REPLACEMENT. MY DEALER HAD TO INSTALL AN ERSATZ.
